projects.title: Space Shooter
projects.description: A classic space shooter game built with Unity, featuring fast-paced action and beautiful space visuals.

projects.title: Platform Adventure
projects.description: A 2D platformer game with challenging levels and unique mechanics. Features pixel art graphics and smooth animations.

projects.title: Puzzle Quest
projects.description: A challenging puzzle game that combines match-3 mechanics with RPG elements. Features procedurally generated puzzles.

projects.title: Racing Simulator
projects.description: A realistic racing simulator with physics-based controls and beautiful track environments.
